name: PainFreeRunning
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Having pain while RUNNING Hip pain Knee pain Low back pain Or, are you looking to get stronger and crush some new PR39s Dr. Cipperoni, licensed sports chiropractor, will guide you through daily stretches, exercises, and movements to help strengthen your running stride. He39ll guide you through a movement in less than three minutes that you can repeat throughout the day or use in your warmup. Tune in and improve your running mechanics and strength.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
